title: Santa, If You’re There
lyrics:
4 Contributors
Santa, If You’re There Lyrics
[Verse 1]
Every Christmas mornin'
I knew that you'd be callin'
Today my phone will not make a sound
You have gone forever
Where don't really matter
I feel your presence still all around
[Pre-Chorus]
Now I'm prayin'
Just the way you used to
I'm not even religious
But it brings me closer to you
So I hope that you can hear me
[Chorus]
Santa, if you're really there
If you really, really care
Help me sneak up into Heaven just one time
I just wanna leave a kiss
Tell her that she's bein' missed
'Cause I never got a chance to say goodbye
Could you try?
[Verse 2]
How I miss your cookin'
The way that you were lookin'
When I told you there's a baby on the way
You took all this time
To teach them songs and rhymes
If you saw them now, I wonder what you'd say



[Pre-Chorus]
Now I'm prayin'
Just the way you used to
I'm not even religious
But it brings me closer to you
So I hope that you can hear me
[Chorus]
Santa, if you're really there
If you really, really care
Help me sneak up into Heaven just one time
I just wanna leave a kiss
Tell her that she's bein' missed
'Cause I never got a chance to say goodbye
Could you try?
[Instrumental Break]
[Outro]
Every Christmas mornin'
I knew that you'd be callin'
Today my phone will not make a sound
album: Not So Silent Night (The Cozy Edition)
